Marinating the steak in salt and pepper overnight causes the flavors to seep into the cut of meat, so you'll taste savory heat all the way to the center of the meat when you cook it. Here's what you'll need for this marinade: 1  1 1/2 teaspoons of salt. 2  2 teaspoons freshly ground pepper.
